elements.content: 1NaCl1NaBr1NaI1KCl1KBr1KI1RbCl1RbBr1RbI‡ Synthesis of {[M1/6Cd(dci)2(H2O)2]·X1/6} (M = Na, X = Cl for 1·NaCl, M = Na, X = Br for 1·NaBr, M = Na, X = I for 1·NaI, M = K, X = Cl for 1·KCl, M = K, X = Br for 1·KBr, M = K, X = I for 1·KI, M = Rb, X = Cl for 1·RbCl, M = Rb, X = Br for 1·RbBr, and M = Rb, X = I for 1·RbI): For 1·NaCl, 1·NaI, 1·KCl, 1·KI, 1·RbCl, and 1·RbI, a solution of Hdci (0.015 g) in deionized water (3 mL, pH was adjusted to 6–7 by using the MOH) was added to a mixture of CdX2 (30 mg) and cat (5 mg) in 3.5 mL of deionized water. The resulting solution was stirred for one hour, filtered, and left to stand at room temperature for a week. Colorless crystals suitable for X-ray diffraction analysis were obtained. Yield: 61% for 1·NaCl, 33% for 1·NaI, 47% for 1·KCl, 55% for 1·KI, 34% for 1·RbCl, and 46% for 1·RbI based on Cd. Elemental analysis (%) for 1·NaCl, C60H36Cd6ClN48NaO12 (Mr = 2354.21): calcd: C, 30.61; H, 1.54; N, 28.56; found: C, 30.40; H, 1.66; N, 28.41. For 1·NaI, C60H36Cd6IN48NaO12 (Mr = 2445.66): calcd.: C, 29.48; H, 1.48; N, 27.51; found: C, 30.78; H, 1.63; N, 28.76. For 1·KCl, C60H36Cd6ClKN48O12 (Mr = 2370.3): calcd.: C, 30.40; H, 1.53; N, 28.37; found: C, 30.75; H, 1.62; N, 28.84. For 1·KI, C60H36Cd6IKN48O12 (Mr = 2461.77): calcd.: C, 29.27; H, 1.47; N, 27.31; found: C, 29.87; H, 1.55; N, 28.00. For 1·RbCl, C60H36Cd6ClN48O12Rb (Mr = 2416.69): calcd.: C, 29.82; H, 1.50; N, 27.82; found: C, 30.40; H, 1.59; N, 28.58. For 1·RbI, C60H36Cd6IN48O12Rb (Mr = 2508.14): calcd.: C, 28.73; H, 1.45; N, 26.81; found: C, 29.25; H, 1.49; N, 27.42. For 1·NaBr, 1·KBr, and 1·RbBr, a solution of Hdci (0.015 g) in deionized water (3 mL, pH was adjusted to 6–7 by using the MOH) was added to a mixture of CdX2 (30 mg) and cat (5 mg) in 3.5 mL of deionized water. The resulting solution was stirred for one hour, filtered, and left to stand at room temperature for a week. Colorless crystals suitable for X-ray diffraction analysis were obtained. Yield: 37% for 1·NaBr, 52% for 1·KBr, and 43% for 1·RbBr based on Cd. Elemental analysis (%) for 1·NaBr, C60H36BrCd6N48NaO12 (Mr = 2398.67): calcd: C, 30.04; H, 1.51; N, 28.03; found: C, 30.78; H, 1.63; N, 28.76. For 1·KBr, C60H36BrCd6KN48O12 (Mr = 2414.78): calcd.: C, 29.84; H, 1.50; N, 27.84; found: C, 29.21; H, 1.52; N, 27.21. For 1·RbBr, C60H36BrCd6N48O12Rb (Mr = 2461.15): calcd.: C, 29.61 H, 1.26; N, 27.68; found: C, 28.54; H, 1.47; N, 26.76.

metadata.title: Ion template effects of 4,5-dicyanoimidazole in the assembly of a series of 3D bimetallic coordination networks
